about_the_game:
DodgeShow: Generation2-DemaⅠ– Ultimate DLC Expansion! New Map! New Characters!

------------------------------------

About the Map:

Whether it’s Galio’s backstory or his performance in the arena, “wall” seems like the perfect word to describe him.

So, why doesn’t a place as ceremonious as Demacia have sculptures or buildings embodying this concept?

That’s where the inspiration comes from!

------------------------------------

About the Character:

In the usual abstract art style—seven parts mischief, three parts cuteness—here comes the little Knight Garen!

name: DodgeShow-Generation2-DemaⅠ
short_description: With this DLC, you can unlock new maps and characters with the theme of Demacia in DodgeShow: Generation2 New map 'City Wall of Justice' New character 'Chibi Galen'
